title: Witch
desc:
Post 2005
- As you play this, you gain access to your own Spell Zone with four slots, the first of which is filled by a copy of (2004) Cauldron.
- Roll a d10 each turn if you don't already.
- Once per turn, if you play a card whose last digit matches the last digit of the d10 you rolled, its effects won't activate. Instead, you must select a slot in your Spell Zone to put the card into, replacing and discarding any card already within that slot, if there is one.
- Each turn, you may play a card from your Spell Zone instead of your hand, following standard color/number conditions. However, the chosen card will stay in your Spell Zone, instead of entering the Play Pile, allowing for re-use.
- You cannot play the same card in the same Spell Zone slot more than once per turn.
